rmd.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all your reminders? (%{count} pending)

delete.title: Choose which reminder(s) you want to delete

rmd.embed-asked: %{user}, you asked me %{duration} ago to remind you of this:
rmd.empty: Oops, you don't have any pending reminder...
rmd.saved: Got it! I'll remind you in %{duration}
rmd.title: List of your reminders
rmd.too-long: Impossible to set such a long duration
rmd.too-short: You have entered an invalid duration
